text:
Janelia Research Campus | Wash DC (Ashburn, VA) | Full-Time | ONSITE | https://goo.gl/ETkrHZ

Janelia (http://www.janelia.org) is looking for two software developers — one concentrating on graphics, the other working mostly on front-end science viz / analysis apps (JS, python). It’s a truly unique environment 15 min north of Dulles. I’d describe it as a Googleplex focused on discovering how the brain works. It's funded by the non-profit Howard Hughes Medical Institute, which has a $18 billion endowment.
